sentences.en: All of the rating agencies still rate California as worthy investimentof investment.
sentences.cn: 所有的信用评价机构仍把加州评为值得投资.

sentences.en: An average flash unit rating of around 60 joules.
sentences.cn: 平均估计,一般的闪光单元约为60焦耳.

sentences.en: But California also has the lowest credit rating of any state.
sentences.cn: 但加州的信用等级是所有各州中最低的.

sentences.en: By the end of the year the Prime Minister’s approval rating (= how many people agreed with his policies ) had fallen as low as 12 percent.
sentences.cn: 到年底时，首相的支持率跌到了12%的低点。

sentences.en: CBS will end the series if it continues to drop in the ratings.
sentences.cn: 这部电视连续剧如果收视率排名继续下降，哥伦比亚广播公司就会停播该剧。

sentences.en: Everyone like this program, so it enjoys a high audience rating.
sentences.cn: 大家都喜欢看这个栏目, 所以它的收视率相当不错.

sentences.en: Four restaurants have been awarded the highest accolade of a three - star rating .
sentences.cn: 四家餐馆获授予 三星级 餐馆的最高荣誉称号.

sentences.en: Harold's rating of some of his brother's creations wasn't very flattering.
sentences.cn: 哈罗德对他兄弟的某些创作的评价并不是太恭维.

sentences.en: It is a ship with a rating of 500, 000 tons.
sentences.cn: 这是一艘五十万吨级的船.

sentences.en: Moody's is one of the largest bond rating agencies in the world.
sentences.cn: 慕迪是全世界最大的债券评等机构之一.

sentences.en: Rating schemes with various levels of sophistication or diseriminatory power are used.
sentences.cn: 采用了具有不同精确度和辨别力的评级方案.

sentences.en: Refine the Use Cases - include requirements, constraints, complexity rating, notes and scenarios.
sentences.cn: 完善用例 - 包括需求, 约束 、 复杂程度 、 注释及情形.

sentences.en: Such tendencies can best be investigated by use of dynamic stability rating techniques.
sentences.cn: 这种趋势最好用动态稳定性评定技术来研究.

sentences.en: The same thought has occurred to the rating agencies.
sentences.cn: 这些令人沮丧的救市方案增加了这一危险.

sentences.en: There is nothing the lower orders like better than a little downright good - humoured rating.
sentences.cn: 下层阶级最喜欢的就是带点爽直愉快的批评.

sentences.en: Wiring regulations often define a maximum fuse current rating for particular circuits.
sentences.cn: 通常定义布线规例,最高为特定电路保险丝的额定电流.

sentences.en: Yeah , credit rating, and for the long - term we have triple A.
sentences.cn: 对, 还有我们的 长期 偿债资信级别是三A级.

words.tran_cn: 可估价的；按比例的；可评价的；应课税的
按比例的；可估价的；应纳税的（等于ratable）
等级；等级评定；额定功率

phrases.tran_cn: 准确度，精确度；[计]精度标称值；[经]准确率评定
业绩评比；作业评定；作业等级
量表；评定量表；等级量表；分等量表
评级系统；评分系统；差饷系统；配给制

trans.tran_cn: 等级，评估，评价，极限，收听率，收视率
trans.tran_en: a level on a scale that shows how good, important, popular etc someone or something is

trans.tran_cn: 估价( rate的现在分词)，定级
